mapper.select:
select e.spclno,e.sptyno,e.spsean,e.spseno,d.sampno,d.sampnm,b.suitno,f.prodnm,sum(b.ormtqt) ormtqt,sum(g.orchqt) orchqt from ord_ord a inner join ord_orddtl b on a.mtorno=b.mtorno inner join ord_ordhd c on a.mtorno=c.mtorno and b.mlorno=c.mlorno inner join ord_sample_design d on b.sampno=d.sampno inner join ord_sample_plan e on d.plspno=e.plspno left join ord_sample_prod f on b.sampno=f.sampno and b.suitno=f.suitno and f.ormtno=#{ormtno} left join ord_ord_chgdtl g on b.sampno=g.sampno and b.suitno=g.suitno and a.ordorg=g.ordorg and g.ormtno=#{ormtno}
group by e.spclno,e.sptyno,e.spsean,e.spseno,d.sampno,d.sampnm,b.suitno,f.prodnm

select a.YXGSNO COMPNO,a.yxgsnm COMPNM,sum(a.ormtqt) ormtqt,sum(g.orchqt) orchqt from ( SELECT ORG.YXGSNO,org.yxgsnm,ORG.qyno ,b.sampno,b.suitno,sum(b.ormtqt) ormtqt from ord_ord a inner join ord_orddtl b on a.mtorno=b.mtorno inner join ord_ordhd c on a.mtorno=c.mtorno and b.mlorno=c.mlorno inner join v_ord_org org on a.ordorg=org.orgno where a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and c.bradno=#{bradno} and c.spclno=#{spclno} and c.szstat=3 and b.sampno=#{sampno} and b.suitno=#{suitno} --AND A.CHANNO='QY' GROUP BY ORG.YXGSNO,org.yxgsnm,ORG.qyno,ORG.qyno ,b.sampno,b.suitno ) a left join ord_ord_chgdtl g on a.sampno=g.sampno and a.suitno=g.suitno and a.qyno=g.ordorg and g.ormtno=#{ormtno} group by a.YXGSNO,a.yxgsnm order by a.YXGSNO

select A.qyno ,A.qynm ,g.ormark,sum(A.ormtqt) ormtqt,sum(g.orchqt) orchqt FROM ( SELECT ORG.qyno,org.qynm ,b.sampno,b.suitno,sum(b.ormtqt) ormtqt from ord_ord a inner join ord_orddtl b on a.mtorno=b.mtorno inner join ord_ordhd c on a.mtorno=c.mtorno and b.mlorno=c.mlorno inner join v_ord_org org on a.ordorg=org.orgno where a.ormtno=#{ormtno} and c.bradno=#{bradno} and c.spclno=#{spclno} and c.szstat=3 and b.sampno=#{sampno} and b.suitno=#{suitno} and org.yxgsno=#{compno} --AND A.CHANNO='QY' GROUP BY ORG.qyno,org.qynm ,b.sampno,b.suitno ) A left join ord_ord_chgdtl g on A.sampno=g.sampno and A.suitno=g.suitno and a.qyno=g.ordorg and g.ormtno=#{ormtno} group by A.qyno ,A.qynm,g.ormark order by A.qyno
